Attributes.description: Banach spaces, linear operators, bounded and compact operators, strong, weak, and weak* topology. Hahn-Banach, open mapping, and closed graph theorems. Hilbert spaces, symmetric and self-adjoint operators, spectral theory for bounded operators.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:00, Building: Mathematics, Room: 204
